Package arcade.sim.checkpoint

Class GraphCheckpoint.Save

java.lang.Object
arcade.sim.checkpoint.Checkpoint
arcade.sim.checkpoint.GraphCheckpoint
arcade.sim.checkpoint.GraphCheckpoint.Save
Enclosing class:
GraphCheckpoint
public static class GraphCheckpoint.Save
extends GraphCheckpoint
Extension of GraphCheckpoint for saving a graph.

Checkpoint saves the graph object. Edge links are removed to save memory.
